alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 08 at 2:12AM MST until February 08 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 8 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow and breezy winds expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches in the mountains and up to 2 inches for the valleys. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Emigration Summit, St. Charles, Montpelier, and Georgetown. * WHEN...From 5 AM early this morning to 8 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Bear Lake Valley; Bear River Range
